bill.title: Department of Health; give authority to levy and collect fee on sales of medical marijuana.
bill.description: An Act To Create New Sections 41-2-1 Through 41-2-29, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The State Department Of Health Shall Administer The Mississippi Medical Marijuana Program With All Powers, Duties And Authority Set Forth In Section ____, Mississippi Constitution Of 1890; To Authorize The Department To Delegate Such Powers, Duties And Authorities As It Sees Fit To Any Mississippi State Agency That Agrees To Accept Such Delegation; To Provide That Each Medical Marijuana Treatment Center Shall Add A Fee On The Final Sale Of Medical Marijuana That Is Equal To The Sales Tax Rate On The Sale Of Tangible Personal Property Levied By Law; To Provide That Treatment Centers Shall Add The Amount Of Such Fee To The Sales Price And Collect The Amount Of The Fee From The Purchaser At The Time Of Sale; To Provide Administrative And Judicial Procedures To The Department To Enable The Department To Collect The Fees From The Treatment Centers; To Provide For Civil And Criminal Penalties For Treatment Centers That Fail To Pay The Fees Due To The Department Under This Act; And For Related Purposes.
